The conquests promised to those who seek to conquer...
The world is on the verge of conquest. The
glorious conquest we await is not far away.
from Mecca, the city where he was born and raised and which he loved so much

text: ...gözyaşları içinde baba yurdu Mekke'den kaçarak çıkan Habibullah...
english: ...Habibullah, fleeing his father's homeland Mecca in tears...
...returned to Mecca as a victorious commander, following the conquest that Allah had promised him,
in the eighth year of the Hijra.

text: ...Mekke'ye muzaffer bir komutan olarak geri döndü.
Efendimiz, iki kişi olarak çıktıkları Mekke'ye...
english: Our Prophet, who had set out for Mecca as a man of two,
returned with an army of ten thousand.

text: Ancak mağrur bir fatih gibi değil, mütevazi bir halde.
english: But not like an arrogant conqueror , but in a humble manner. With

text: Başı secde eder gibi devenin boynuna yapışmış...
english: his head clinging to the camel's neck as if in prostration ...
...he was going along, giving thanks. The

text: Allah resulu bu büyük fethi kendisinden bilmedi.
english: Messenger of Allah did not attribute this great conquest to himself.

text: (İbn-i Arabi) Mütevazi bir halle Mekke'nin sokaklarında ilerleyerek şükretti.
english: (Ibn Arabi) walked humbly through the streets of Mecca, giving thanks . The

text: Emir buyurdu ki Ebu Süfyan'ın evine giren güvendedir.
english: commander ordered that whoever enters Abu Sufyan's house is safe.
He's safe and sound, having put down his weapon and gone into his house. Those who
seek refuge in the Kaaba are safe.

text: Mekke, rahmet insanının ahlakıyla bir kez daha fethedildi.
english: Mecca was conquered once again through the moral character of a compassionate man.

text: Kan dökmeden Mekke alınmış, af bayramı ilan edilmişti.
english: Mecca was captured without bloodshed, and a festival of forgiveness was declared.

text: Efendimiz, çok sevdiği amcasını öldüren vahşiyi...
english: Our Prophet said that he forgave the savage who killed his beloved uncle...

text: ...ve kendisine kötülük yapan bütün düşmanlarını affettiğini söyledi.
english: ...and all his enemies who had wronged him. Through his

text: O, bu yaptıklarıyla kazanmanın ve muzaffer olmanın ahlakını herkese gösterdi.
english: actions, he showed everyone the ethics of winning and being victorious. It is fitting for those who conquer

text: Fetih ehline yakışan onu rehber edinmektir.
english: to take him as their guide.
So why didn't he kill his enemies?

text: Evlat, o öldürmek için değil, yaşatmak için gönderildi.
english: My son, he was sent not to kill, but to give life. HE; He is the servant and messenger

text: O; rahman, rahim, gafur ve halim olan Allah'ın...
english: of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, the Most Forgiving, and the Most Clement...

text: Bir isteğin var mıdır diye soracaktım.
english: I was going to ask if you had any requests.

text: Tek isteğim vardı. O da geldi çok şükür.
english: only had one wish. He arrived too, thank goodness.
...when I see you, all my worries and troubles disappear...
...and that's enough for me. Will you be able to say

text: Ertuğrul obadayken de bunları söyleyebilecek misin?
english: these things while Ertuğrul is in the tribe ?

text: Ertuğrul'un olduğu yerde huzur yoktur Gökçe.
english: There is no peace where Ertuğrul is, Gökçe.

text: Alplerimin gözü önünde beni defalarca çiğnediği için keyfi yerinde Ertuğrul'un.
english: Ertuğrul is pleased because he trampled over me repeatedly in front of my Alps.
(Boğaç) It's us, sir. Is permission granted?
How did you escape? We were

text: İkimiz de ağır yaralandık beyim. Kendimden geçmişim.
english: both seriously injured, sir. I was beside myself.

text: Gözümü açtığımda bir köydeydim. Bir baktım Samsa orada.
english: When I opened my eyes, I was in a village. I looked and Samsa was there. My brother

text: Bulmuş, kurtarmış, götürmüş köye beni kardeşim.
english: found me, rescued me, and took me to the village.

text: İyileşene kadar köyde kaldık. Sonra da iki at bulup obaya döndük beyim.
english: We stayed in the village until I recovered. Then we found two horses and returned to the camp, my lord.
Sir, we heard what happened to that scoundrel Kocabaş.

text: Bana iyi bir şey söyle Tangut.
Sonunda en güvendiğim adamım olduğunu ispat ettin Tangut.
english: finally proved yourself to be the man I trust most, Tangut.

text: Sungur Tekin'in bizden aldıklarını geri getirdin.
english: You brought back what Sungur Tekin took from us.

text: Konya'ya gidiyor Noyan. Halime Sultan'la o demirci de yanında.
english: Noyan is going to Konya. Halime Sultan and the blacksmith are also with her.
even more aggressive now. From now on, he wo

text: Bundan sonra ona nefes aldırmak yok.
english: n't be given a moment's respite. We

text: Onu elimize düşürüp, bezdirene kadar durmak yok.
english: won't stop until we get our hands on him and wear him down completely.
-By God, we are with you, sir. -Thank you, sir.

text: Hemen gidelim beyim. Bu güzel günü kefere keserek geçirelim.
english: Let's go immediately, sir. Let's spend this beautiful day slaughtering infidels.

text: Beyim. Biz ne zaman Alpliğimizi geri alacağız?
english: . When will we reclaim our Alpine heritage?

text: Bizim Alpliğimizi kim elimizden alabilir Doğan?
english: Who can take our Alpine heritage away from us, Doğan?

text: Biz Alp doğduk, Alp öleceğiz evelallah.
english: We were born as Alps, and we will die as Alps, God willing. Is there anything
When will we take our Alps from Mr. Tugtekin...?

text: ...Tuğtekin Bey’den, Alplerimizi ne zaman alacağız beyim?
english: When will we take our Alps from Mr. Tugtekin, sir?

text: Toyun aldığını ancak toy verir Bamsı.
english: Bamsı, only the wedding can give what the wedding has received. Anything
beyond this would be unbecoming of us.

text: Her şeyin bir vakti vardır elbet.

english: you all live long, my brave men.
You never left me alone. While

text: İçimizdeki, dışımızdaki bütün hainler beni türlü iftiralarla karalarken…
english: all the traitors, both within and outside our ranks, were slandering me with all sorts of false accusations…

text: …tereddüt etmeden bana inandınız. Asıl sizler çok yaşayın.
english: you believed in me without hesitation. May you all live long. Do
not deviate from the traditions of Oğuz, nor from our religion. Thank you.

text: Beni iyice anladın mı ahmak herif?
english: you understand me properly, you idiot?

text: Sungur Tekin ile Halime Sultan asla Alaeddin’in karşısına çıkmayacak.
english: Sungur Tekin and Halime Sultan will never confront Alaeddin. You will
go to the palace and weave your web.

text: Onlar huzura çıkmadan önce işlerini göreceksin.
english: You will take care of your business before they appear before you.
You will leave for Konya early in the morning.

text: Yolda başına bir hâl gelmesin diye Tangut da seninle gelecek.
english: Tangut will come with you to make sure nothing happens to you on the way.
If you don't do what I say... I'll

text: …Konya’ya gelir, seni kendi ellerimle gebertirim, bilmiş ol.
english: come to Konya and kill you with my own hands , just so you know.
Now get out of my sight.

text: Noyan. Abdurrahman ve Hamza’yı da yanıma alayım mı?
english: Noyan. Should I take Abdurrahman and Hamza with me as well ?
Ooo! Wa alaikum assalam . Wa alaikum assalam
road opens up for us again, son. I don't know how I would have managed to do all this

text: Siz olmasaydınız bunca şeyin altından nasıl kalkardım hiç bilmiyorum.

english: person aspires to be like Moses …
…God will surely send him a Khidr.
People are merely instruments. You need to check who sent it.

text: Ben giderim. Lakin dervişim sana emanettir.
english: I'll leave. But my dervish is entrusted to your care. It would

text: Obanın mescidinde bir vazife verirsen iyi olur.
english: be good if you gave him a job at the village mosque.

text: Onları iyi beslersen, iyi yetiştirirsen, iyi de hasat alırsın. Unutma.
english: If you feed them well, raise them well, you will have a good harvest. Don't forget. Thank you, Sheikh, for

text: Bu kutlu vazifeyi bana layık gördünüz ya şeyhim, Allah razı olsun.
english: deeming me worthy of this blessed duty. May God be pleased with you. I
will protect what has been entrusted to me.
(Sound of burning meat with a hot iron)

text: Ögeday’ın şanlı ordusunu bu topraklarda telef ettin.
english: Ögeday's glorious army in these lands.
From now on, defeat, not victory,

text: Komutanlık vazifesi yakandan düşene dek seninle mücadele edeceğim Noyan.
english: will fight you, Noyan, until the command is no longer your responsibility.
(Music - Suspense) Are you happy, Abdurrahman, that you

text: Kendi boyunu satıp Noyan’ın yanına geldiğin için mutlu musun Abdurrahman?
english: sold your own land and came to Noyan's side ?
I didn't betray anyone. I am

text: Sadece Ögeday’ın şanlı ordusunda daha da yükselebilmek için buradayım.
english: only here to rise even higher in Ögeday's glorious army .
Every day leads us to death.

text: Gölgemiz gibi ölümüne yaşarız her daim.
english: We live forever, like our shadows, even to the point of death . If we

text: Başarısız olur da ölürsek ne âlâ.
english: fail and die, so be it . And
when we return here dejectedly… we
keep lamenting why we didn't die.
Tomorrow he will send Karabek to Konya. He wants to kill

text: Halime Sultan’ı sarayda Alaeddin’in huzuruna çıkmadan öldürmek ister.
english: Halime Sultan in the palace before she appears before Alaeddin.
…he’ll kill me without a second thought.
So, as you can understand, I'm tired of it all.

text: Bakalım sen ne kadar dayanacaksın bu eziyete.
english: Let's see how long you can endure this torment. Is there any path

text: Bizim için ölümden gayrı yol mu var Tangut?
english: for us other than death, Tangut? We have
no fear of that either, thank God.
You will give Ertuğrul to me, Abdurrahman. I'll

text: Öyle ya da böyle alacağım onu.
english: get it one way or another.

text: Öyle ya da böyle bu hepimiz için en hayırlısı olacaktır ağabey.
english: Either way, this will be best for all of us, brother.

text: En azından kendi yolumuzda gitmeyi öğrenecek kadar sırtımızdan bıçaklandık.
english: At least we've been stabbed in the back enough to learn to go our own way.
My brother tells the truth, mother.

text: Bu iş bu toyda mutlaka bitmeli.
english: This matter must be settled at this gathering.

text: Peki oğul, tek başına Noyan’la nasıl baş edeceksin?
english: So son, how are you going to deal with Noyan all by yourself?
There is a newborn. Turgut, Bamsi.
They exist, mother. There is a deer.
The game begins. I'm absolutely certain

text: Adım gibi eminim, Ertuğrul ayağımıza dolanacak.
english: Ertuğrul will get in our way.
Ertuğrul is on every other topic he mentions. If

text: Önlem almazsak, sıra bize gelecek ağabey.
english: we don't take precautions, it will be our turn next, big brother. Let's
I haven't played my game yet.

text: Konya’da sarayda Ertuğrul gibilerini ben yetiştirdim.
english: In Konya, at the palace, I trained people like Ertuğrul.
Let's see how long the fruits of his victory last.

text: Ertuğrul sandığından çok daha zeki ağabey.
english: Ertuğrul is much smarter than you think, older brother.
I'll unleash Tuğtekin on him first. Let
them play around like children. Then
if he finds out what we did? What if he exposes

text: Kocabaş gibi bizi de ortaya çıkarırsa?
english: us too, like he did to Kocabaş? Aytolun won't

text: Beni neden burada görmek istedin Noyan?
english: Why did you want to see me here, Noyan?

text: Kayılar ile Dodurgalılar iç savaşın eşiğinden Efrasiyab.
english: The Kayi and Dodurga tribes were on the brink of civil war, thanks to Afrasiyab.
winter ends and the war begins… we must settle

text: İkimiz bu işin üstesinden geliriz Noyan.
english: We can handle this together, Noyan.

text: Bilirim, Moğol ordusunun önünde Tengri Dağı gibi duracaklar.
english: I know they will stand like Mount Tengri in front of the Mongol army. They will not be able to defeat
But they're going to hurt us a lot. They will continue to harm us

text: Ordumuz Konya’ya girene kadar bize zarar verecekler.

english: What do you want from me, Noyan? Did you bring

text: Sürüyü ve malları almaya gittiğinde altınları yanında götürmeyesin.
english: When you go to collect the flock and the goods, do not take the gold with you.
-Noyan, our agreement involves the gold... -Do as I say. You'll say, "
The gold is on its way, it's coming from Erzurum ."
While waiting for the gold in Obada…
…there’s something I want you to do .

text: Babanız ne kadar talihli bir adam.
english: Your father is such a lucky man.

text: Her gün ayağı için ona taze ot toplarsınız.
english: Every day you gather fresh grass for her feet. I'm the one who's truly fortunate to have

text: Onun gibi bir babam olduğu için asıl ben talihliyimdir Gündoğdu Bey’im.
english: a father like him, Mr. Gündoğdu. The

text: Sizi alacak adam da en az babanız kadar talihli olacaktır.
english: man who marries you will be just as lucky as your father.

text: Dediğiniz gibi bir yiğit çıkar da içimizdeki güzelliği de görürse…
english: As you said, if a brave man emerges and sees the beauty within us… then it will be our duty to honor him and

text: …o vakit bize boyunu boylayıp, soyunu soylamak düşer Gündoğdu Bey’im.
english: trace his lineage, Mr. Gündoğdu. Now is the time to

text: O vakit gönlümdekini sana söylemenin vakti gelmiştir.
english: tell you what's in my heart.

text: Ben seninle ve inşallah evlatlarımla bir ömür geçirmek isterim.
english: I would like to spend a lifetime with you and, God willing, with our children . "

text: Gönlün ne güzel der Gündoğdu Bey’im.
english: What a beautiful heart you have," says Mr. Gündoğdu.
Where are you going in this state?
Ertuğrul will not remain idle at the feast.

text: Eğer bu hâlde gidersen Ertuğrul’un işini daha da kolaylaştıracaksın.
english: If you continue like this, you'll only make Ertuğrul's job easier.

text: Toy, Alpbaşlığını Ertuğrul’dan eli çolak olduğu için almıştı.
english: Toy had received the title of Alpbaşı from Ertuğrul because he had a crippled hand.

text: Sen de şu an aynı durumdasın.
english: You are in the same situation right now.

text: Eğer toya katılırsan, Ertuğrul bunu kullanacaktır.
english: If you attend the wedding, Ertuğrul will use it against you. No matter what,

text: Her ne olursa olsun toya katılacağım Gökçe.
english: I'll attend the wedding, Gökçe. If

text: Ertuğrul babam dâhil bütün toyu ikna edip, istediklerini yapacağını sanırsa, yanılır.
english: Ertuğrul thinks he can convince the entire council, including my father, and get what he wants, he's mistaken.
Brother Geyikli. There's no time to lose.
Go to the camp immediately, to Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Halime Sultan ile Sungur Tekin. Hayatları tehlikede.
english: Halime Sultan and Sungur Tekin. Their lives are in danger.
(Hand on chest, sounds of salutation) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious,

text: Esirgeyen ve bağışlayan Yüce Allah’ın doksan dokuz adıyla.
english: ninety-nine names of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
(Korkut) Gentlemen, we've been through tough times.
(Korkut) We felt the enemy's breath on our necks .

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in sayesinde kurulan tuzakları atlattık şükür.
english: Thanks to Ertuğrul Bey, we managed to overcome the traps that were set.

text: Şimdi de Hayme Ana’nın isteğiyle bir araya geldik.
english: Now we have come together again at the request of Hayme Ana . I

text: Ertuğrul Bey’i de toyda aramızda görmek istedim.
english: also wanted to see Ertuğrul Bey among us at the feast . He came, thank you very much
Please, Hayme Ana. The esteemed lords of
After the disaster of the raid we experienced…

text: …her iki obanın Alplerini, tek bir baş Alpin emrine verdik.
english: …we placed the Alps of both tribes under the command of a single Alpine chief.
I want you to know that…
…we still stand by our decision today . You

text: Arkasındasınız da o hâlde ne istersiniz?
english: 're behind it, so what do you want? From the assembly where

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in vazifelerinin alındığı toydan bugüne değin…
english: Ertuğrul Bey was assigned his duties until today… we have
witnessed that everything he said has come true, one by one.
(Gündoğdu) Is there anyone who can argue otherwise?
(Rabarba) It turned out to be true. Yes. It turned out to be true. Everything

text: Ertuğrul Bey’imizin söylediği her söz doğru çıktı.
english: Ertuğrul Bey said turned out to be true. Do

text: Şimdi de pişman mı olduk dersiniz?
english: you think we regret it now?

text: Ertuğrul Bey olsaydı, bunların hiçbiri olmazdı deriz.
english: Ertuğrul Bey were alive, none of this would have happened.
The enemy is rampant. The gravity of the situation is clear.
We are not looking for a scapegoat.

text: Bir daha canımız yanmasın diye tedbir almak isteriz.
english: We want to take precautions so that we don't get hurt again.

text: Başalpliğimi elimden almak istersiniz, öyle mi?
english: You want to take my title of Chief Alp away from me, don't you ? We request that

text: Başalplik vazifesinin yeniden bize verilmesini talep ederiz.
english: the position of Chief Alp be reinstated to us. You want to
seize the opportunity that comes your way and…

text: Güç, kudret ne demek bilir misin Tuğtekin?
english: what power and might mean, Tugtekin? It means staying on the right path

text: Öfkene ve sinirine hâkim olarak istikamet üzere olmaktır.
english: by controlling your anger and frustration .

text: …Tuğtekin Bey’in görevi Alpleri bir ve diri tutmaktı.
english: Mr. Tuğtekin's duty was to keep the Alps united and strong.
But you failed in your duty .
Noyan used this to his advantage and…
… brought us to the brink of bloodshed.
You finally revealed your intentions, Ertuğrul.

text: Şimdi de bu fırsatı kullanmak istersin.
english: Now you would like to take advantage of this opportunity. Are

text: O çolak elinle mi geçeceksin Alplerin başına?
english: you going to climb the Alps with that crippled hand of yours ? Is
would like Gündoğdu Bey to take charge of the Alps.
(Rabarba) Yes, you're right. Mr. Gündoğdu should pass.
I too would like to see
Mr. Gündoğdu take charge of the Alps. If you'll allow me

text: Müsaaden olursa, senin ve beylerinin ne düşündüğünüzü bilmek isterim.
english: , I'd like to know what you and your husband think.
Whether you like Hayme Hatun or not …

text: …gayrı bu meseleye bir dur demek gerek.
english: …it’s time to put an end to this matter .
What will we tell the Alps?
What are we going to tell people? If
the roles change at every gathering… wouldn’t

text: …ahali demez mi bunlar ne iş görür?
english: the people wonder what these people actually do ?

text: Müsaadenle beyim, birkaç kelam da ben etmek isterim.
english: With your permission, sir, I would like to say a few words as well .
village has not found peace for a long time.

text: Millet toyda birlik sağlanamadığı için eziyet çeker.
english: The nation suffers because unity cannot be achieved at the feast . As long as

text: İçte biz, dışta düşman böyle mücadele ettikçe…
english: we fight like this internally and the enemy externally…

text: Beyim, biz Kayılarla birlik olup, bir yola baş koymuşsak…
english: My lord, if we have united with the Kayı tribe and embarked on a path together…

text: O vakit toyun beylerine karar düşsün.
english: Then let the decision fall to the lords of the assembly.

text: Şimdi, Gündoğdu Bey’in Alpbaşı olmasını isteyen beyler…
english: Now, gentlemen who want Gündoğdu Bey to be Alpbaşı…
Sir, may I ? Here you go, son

text: Allah bu vazifeyi bana layık gören her iki obanın beylerinden de razı olsun.
english: God be pleased with the chieftains of both tribes who deemed me worthy of this duty .

text: Bilin ki iki obanın Alplerini de kardeşim bileceğim.
english: Know that I will regard the Alps of both tribes as my brothers. I will prepare

text: Onları tek bir babanın evlatları gibi cenge hazır hâle getireceğim.
english: them for battle as if they were all sons of one father . May
God never let any of us be ashamed of the decisions we make.
-May God not let you be ashamed, my son. -God willing, mother. May
How did you do it, Mr. Gümüştekin?

text: Ha? Beni bir kalemde beylerin önünde nasıl harcadın?
english: Ha? How could you discard me so easily in front of the gentlemen ?
me who ruined you, it was your father.

text: Baban da, diğer beyler de kararlarını önceden vermişlerdi.
english: Your father, and the other gentlemen, had already made their decisions. They had written
you off. They were going to
strip him of his position as Chief Alp.

text: Keşke elimden bir şey gelseydi evlat.
english: I wish I could do something, son .

text: Düğününün tadını çıkar. Güzel gelinimizle gerdeğinin keyfini sür.
english: Enjoy your wedding. Enjoy your wedding night with our beautiful bride.

text: Asıl vazifen, asıl imtihanın o vakit başlayacaktır.
english: Your real task, your real test, will begin then.
What would you like to say?

text: Baban artık beylik yükünü taşıyamaz. Görmez misin?
english: Your father can no longer bear the burden of the household. Ca n't you see? He's

text: Hasta o. Fazla vakti de yoktur.
english: sick. He doesn't have much time either.

text: Şunu bil ki o vakit geldiğinde…
english: Know this: when that time comes…
I'll ask for your permission tomorrow to go ask for your hand in marriage.
If it will bring you happiness…
…if it will add to your blessed stature and your lineage…
Gümüştekin know about this? If you could send someone to tell them we're coming to ask for her hand in marriage

text: Yarın kız istemeye geleceğimizi söylemek için…

english: If this is what she desires…
…it is up to us to give our permission. I hope everything turns out for the best .
Everyone's destiny is written differently. May

text: Sence Goncagül Hatun ağabeyime eş olabilir mi ana?
english: you think Goncagül Hatun could be a suitable wife for my brother, mother? I was the one who wanted
When will Halime return, son? He brought information

text: Sultan Alaeddin’e Atabey Ertokuş’la ilgili bilgileri götürdü.
english: about Atabey Ertokuş to Sultan Alaeddin .
He will inform us of the situation and then return.

text: …şüphesiz ki sen tuzak kuranların en hayırlısısın.
english: …surely You are the best of those who plot. Oh Lord, foil

text: Bize kurulmuş tuzakları boşa çıkar ya rabbim.
english: the traps that have been set for us . Do not leave
me to myself, do not leave me to my enemies.

text: …bir tespihin taneleri gibi dağılmış, parça parça olmuş ümmet için can vereyim.
english: … give my life for the Ummah, which is scattered and fragmented like the beads of a rosary. Do not
withdraw your hand from us, lest we become

text: Adını güneşin doğup battığı her yere taşıyalım.
english: Let's carry his name to every place where the sun rises and sets.

text: …ezan-ı Muhammet, gök kubbenin her yerinde sonsuza dek yankılansın.
english: …the call to prayer of Muhammad may echo forever throughout the heavens. Oh
…don’t let me stray from the right path, my Lord.

text: Abdurrahman Alp, Noyan’dan haber getirmiştir beyim.
english: Abdurrahman Alp has brought news from Noyan, my lord.

text: Saray da onları öldürmesi için Karabek’i peşlerinden göndermiştir.
english: The palace sent Karabek after them to kill them.
What am I going to do, mother? How could I possibly allow him to share a

text: O kadınla aynı döşeğe girmesine gönlüm nasıl razı olacak?

english: If you love your husband, you'll have to fight for him, my daughter.
knows what you did for him.
He knows your love, he knows your respect.
That's why he won't divorce you.
Therefore, he doesn't show any affection.
I wish he had killed me. If only it could save me from dying

text: Her gün böyle parça parça ölmekten kurtaraydı.
english: piece by piece like this every day .

text: …Halime Sultan’ın da, Deli Demir’in de hayatı tehlikededir.
english: …both Halime Sultan's and Deli Demir's lives are in danger.

text: Ertuğrul. Bu iş böyle olmaz kardeşim.
english: Ertuğrul. This won't work like this, brother.

text: Oba da, anam da sana emanettir ağabey.
english: My family and my mother are entrusted to your care, brother.
From now on, it's like this. You'll be the

text: Başım dara düştüğünde ilk sen bileceksin.
english: first to know when I'm in trouble.
No, brother. Hopefully you won't fall into hardship.

text: Lakin düşersen de her zaman arkanda olacağım, bilesin.
english: But even if you fall, know that I'll always be there for you.
If I can make it… I’ll come to see how humiliated and cowered he looks

text: …kayınbabanın karşısında nasıl ezilip büzüldüğünü görmeye geleceğim.
